name: Their Perspective
description:
This game is about the perspectives of animals who suffer environmental problems that are not discussed much. It is a 2.5D top-down simulator in which you are an animal, in this case, a Humpback whale [More levels coming later for different animals], searching for food in the ocean, but not everything you eat is necessarily food. 

Version 1.1.0.0 - Removed the ability to move backwards, fixed the game to prevent movement after death and to show a fixed score

If you have any queries or face any issues, you can contact me at victeldo@gmail.com  I'll try my hardest to respond to you at my earliest convenience.

MAC AND WINDOWS SUPPORT - LINUX SUPPORT WILL BE ADDED LATER
